channel.title: Error when trying to load
channel.description:
[code=java][Launcher] Initiating Cache... Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at com.rs.utils.Utils.getItemDefinitionsSize(Utils.java:244) at com.rs.cache.loaders.ItemEquipIds.init(ItemEquipIds.java:13) at com.rs.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:69) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Whenever I try to load my server I get this error. As far as I am aware the cache is in the correct place that I've determined in the Settings.java.
Thought I'd mention, this happens with every source I am using, 711s.

item.title: Error when trying to load
item.dc:creator: @PvM_Iain PvM Iain
item.description:
